# ---------------------------------------------\
# About Hire Blink\
\
Hire Blink is a full-cycle recruiting agency that partners with staffing firms and high-growth companies across tech, legal, and healthcare. \
We specialize in sourcing and placing top-tier talent for early-stage startups, AM Law 100 firms, health systems, and defense contractors.\
\
We combine a proactive, hunter-style sourcing strategy with AI tools like Juicebox, LinkedIn Recruiter, and high-volume outreach to deliver candidates fast \'97 often in under 7 days.\
\
Clients trust Hire Blink to fill roles like Founding Engineers, Growth Marketers, Software Developers, Litigation Attorneys, Paralegals, Mental Health Professionals, and more.\
\
To learn more, visit https://hire-blink.com or contact us at info@hire-blink.com.\
\
# ---------------------------------------------\
# Overview\
\
This documentation outlines the features and benefits of an AI-powered recruiting solution designed specifically for staffing agencies. It emphasizes efficiency, affordability, and a done-for-you delivery model.\
\
# Key Features\
\
- Full-Cycle Recruiting: From sourcing to screening to submission \'97 all handled for you.\
- AI-Enhanced Targeting: Intelligent filtering and outreach using leading tools and platforms.\
- Cost-Effective: Affordable and scalable solutions without sacrificing candidate quality.\
\
# Related Links\
\
- https://hire-blink.com/\
\
